creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi and in honor of Robert Cozzolino
description: pencil line drawing of walking woman wearing glasses and a short dress, holding a leash; food counter behind woman with picture of a pizza slice; figure lying on sidewalk, vomiting, at right; "SAVE MONEY / SECOND NATIONAL BANK" on sign above vomiting figure; pizza, "SAVE MONEY', and vomit are all similarly patterned red, orange, and yellow; text in Japanese and English in pencil and blue ink, and sketch in blue ink, in bottom margin
medium: Colored pencil, graphite, and blue ballpoint pen on paper
title: Untitled [Save Money]
